title.full: Tom Clancys Splinter Cell Pandora Tomorrow

description.full: In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell®: Pandora Tomorrow™, you play Sam Fisher, a cold-blooded stealth soldier waging a one-man war against an Indonesian terrorist network. Inspired by the world of Tom Clancy, Pandora Tomorrow features a story line so real you can feel it. Tension-filled stealth action springs from a compelling and original plot that’s so realistic it could’ve been ripped from the headlines by scriptwriter JT Petty, who penned the original Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell.
description.short: In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell®: Pandora Tomorrow™, you play Sam Fisher, a cold-blooded stealth soldier waging a one-man war against an Indonesian terrorist network.
